1.job_description: Data Scientist specializing in Forecasting. Built a scalable LightGbm/Prophet model dramatically improving short-term forecast accuracy. Lead R&D for Merchant level forecasting as well as unsupervised anomoly detection methods. Built custom pipelines to support promotions and inventory stock-out adjustments. Guide overall software development strategy and help implement best practices.

2.job_description: Senior Data Scientist specializing in real time pricing. Expert maintainer of various machine learning and statistical models that powered the live pricing service and multiple business critical services. Led development for automated tender acceptance. Interview, hire, and mentor numerous all applicants and hires helping grow a team of 2 to over 10.

3.job_description: Deploy various statistics and ML-based pricing models using ensemble/boosting techniques, LightGBM, XGBoost, Catboost, Random Forest Quantile Regression, KNN-regression, etc. Built algorithms for freight recommendation using collaborative filtering and ML models. Implement shapely endpoint to give human readable explanations for model recommendations. Validate production recommender service with A/B tests.

4.job_description: Junior Data Scientist on newly formed team. Built and maintained custom enterprise account forecasts with R and SPSS (ARIMA, ETS, etc.). Built and automated freight matching algorithms with R and Python.

5.job_description: Develop predictive models for 7 different debt portfolios(Healthcare, Utilities, etc.) to segment debtors based on likelihood to pay. Score incoming placements and recommend collection strategy for optimal collection efficiency.
